items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a medicine ball with both hands at chest level.
Engage your core and lift the ball overhead, fully extending your arms.
Take a step forward with your left foot and shift your weight onto your left leg.
As you step forward, forcefully throw the ball forward and down towards the ground.
Release the ball just before it reaches the ground.
Repeat the exercise, alternating legs with each throw.

content.title: Medicine Ball Overhead Throw Form & Visual

items: Improves power and explosiveness in the upper body
Targets the shoulders, chest, and triceps
Engages the core muscles for stability and balance
Can be used as a full-body warm-up exercise
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals

content.title: Medicine Ball Overhead Throw Muscles Worked

items: Shoulders
Triceps
Core
Legs

content.title: Medicine Ball Overhead Throw Variations & Alternatives

items: Medicine Ball Slam
Medicine Ball Chest Pass
Medicine Ball Side Throw
Medicine Ball Rotational Throw
Medicine Ball Wall Throw
